org.apache.juneau.transform

Class InterfaceBeanFilterBuilder<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.transform.BeanFilterBuilder<T>
      • org.apache.juneau.transform.InterfaceBeanFilterBuilder<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The interface class.

    public class InterfaceBeanFilterBuilder<T>
extends BeanFilterBuilder<T>
    Simple bean filter that simply identifies a class to be used as an interface class for all child classes.

    These objects are created when you pass in non-BeanFilterBuilder classes to BeanContextBuilder.beanFilters(Class...), and are equivalent to adding a @Bean(interfaceClass=Foo.class) annotation on the Foo class.
